single.title: Device
single.searchString: | inputlookup CiscoSNMPInfo | search host=$form.host$ | fields host | appendcols [search sourcetype=Cisco:SmartCallHome host=$form.host$ | rename "soap-env:Envelope.soap-env:Body.aml-block:Block.aml-block:Content.ch-inv:CallHome.ch-inv:CustomerData.ch-inv:SystemInfo.ch-inv:Name" AS host | fields host | head 1]

table.title: Status
table.searchString: | inputlookup CiscoSNMPInfo | search host=$form.host$ | fields sysDescr sysLocation hostName

table.title: Device info
table.searchString: sourcetype=Cisco:SmartCallHome host=$form.host$ | rename "rme:Model" AS model | rename "rme:SerialNumber" AS serial_number | rename "rme:VersionString" AS software_version | stats latest(model) AS model, latest(serial_number) AS serial_number, latest(software_version) AS software_version

table.title: Severities
table.searchString: | pivot Cisco_IOS_Event Cisco_IOS_Event count(Cisco_IOS_Event) AS "Count of Event" SPLITROW severity_name AS "severity_name" SORT 100 severity_name FILTER host is $form.host$

div.data-options: { "app": "cisco_ios", "preview": true, "search": "sourcetype=cisco:ios host=$form.host$ | eval fsm=facility + \"-\" + severity_id + \"-\" + mnemonic | chart count by fsm", "earliest_time": "-24h" }

table.title: Interfaces
table.searchString: host=$form.host$ sourcetype=Cisco:SNMP:Interfaces UID=* ifHCInOctets=* | streamstats current=f global=f window=1 first(ifHCInOctets) as next_ifHCInOctets, first(_time) as next_time by host,UID | eval dt=next_time-_time | eval difHCInOctets=next_ifHCInOctets-ifHCInOctets | eval rifHCInOctets=difHCInOctets/dt | eval in_bytes=rifHCInOctets*8 | lookup CiscoSNMPInterfaces host,UID | stats sparkline(avg(in_bytes),10m) AS utilization_in by ifDescr,ifAlias,ifOperStatus,ifAdminStatus,ifIndex | sort ifIndex | table ifDescr,ifAlias,ifOperStatus,ifAdminStatus,utilization_in

table.title: Smart Call Home (temporary)
table.searchString: host=$form.host$ sourcetype=Cisco:SmartCallHome | fields - _*, date*, punct, linecount, index, eventtype, source, sourcetype, splunk_server, tag, tag::eventtype, time*pos, "soap-env:Envelope.soap-env:Body.aml-block:Block.aml-block:Attachments.aml-block:Attachment.aml-block:Data" | stats values(*) | transpose
